Html:
One of the developer has reported a few minor problems for 3.4 release, and I have just fixed those minor issues for both the SVN source and the downloadable zip file on April 13th at 5:00 p.m (EST).

If you have downloaded or checked-out the source from SVN before this time, please either re-download/re-check-out, or make the following changes:

1. Open the GoblinXNA.sln file using VS2008 in /src directory, and modify the class name of DirectShowCapture2 to DirectShowCapture in DirectShowCapture.cs under Device/Capture package and recompile the project

2. Open the Tutorials.sln file using VS2008 in /tutorials and modify the output target of Tutoial 12 in Debug configuration to ../../bin/ instead of bin/x86/Debug.

Ohan
